blocks.latex: \frac{d}{dx}(- \log \cos x) = \frac{1}{\cos x} \cdot \frac{d}{dx}(-\cos x) = \frac{\sin x}{\cos^2 x} = \tan x.

blocks.text: Example 11. – Find the value of \int \sin^2 x \, dx.
